name: Statix960796
description: Statix is a dot-matrix rendered, time-based periodic function. This version has a shorter framecount, leading to a tighter loop. Its range, colors, and other parameters are limited, producing color distortion, striation, speed alterations and changes of direction. Some slight post-processing produces a fuzzy, static effect. Seed value for this animation is 960796. Values are then curated and guided in a process of experimental aesthetic manipulation.
